alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 3:51AM CDT until June 08 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tuscaloosa County in west central Alabama... Southwestern Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 350 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eoline, or 10 miles northwest of Brent, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brent, Centreville, Vance, Eoline, Low Gap, West Centreville, Pearson, Harmon and Hagler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
